mapper.sql: select UserNo, UserId, UserPw, UserName, Nickname, Email, UserPhone, ZipCode, Address, DetailAddress, BankName, accountHolder, BankAccount from userinfo
mapper.select: select UserNo, UserId, UserPw, UserName, Nickname, Email, UserPhone, ZipCode, Address, DetailAddress, BankName, accountHolder, BankAccount, secession from userinfo where userId = #{userId} and userPw = password(#{userPw})
mapper.insert: insert into userinfo( UserId, UserPw, UserName, Nickname, Email, UserPhone, ZipCode, Address, DetailAddress, BankName, AccountHolder, BankAccount) values(#{userId}, password(#{userPw}), #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{userPhone}, #{zipCode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{bankName}, #{accountHolder}, #{bankAccount})
